description.value:
Simple Booby traps consisting of sharp sticks, often placed in hidden pits. Any that step into an area of them must make a +0 Agility Test or take 1d10+2 Rending Damage.

Requirements

Easily Craftable with access to wood or similar material that can be sharpened.

Effect: Common

Notes: 1 T
